backend/main.mo: Defines data types and CRUD-like functions for mods, story modes, showcases, and user profiles with access control and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for many frontend files, describing their purpose in routing, UI, utilities, and mod-related flows.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles and a full OKLCH‑based color theme for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML document mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router structure, theme provider, layout, and all main application routes.
A modal that forces users to watch a 60‑second ad with a countdown before allowing completion of certain actions.
Displays a 30‑second advertisement component with countdown, video playback, and fallback UI.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal that collects a display name and saves the user profile via mutation with basic validation and toasts.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wrapper that checks Internet Identity auth state and shows a sign‑in prompt or loading state before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with header, navigation, footer, and branding, wrapping all page content.
frontend/src/components/layout/Responsiv: Responsive navigation bar providing login/logout and authenticated links for both desktop and mobile via a sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/mods/FileCompose: Interface for uploading files or creating text files with validation, limits, and removal controls for mod file sets.
frontend/src/components/mods/ModEditorFo: Form for editing mod metadata with live validation for title, version, description, and prompt.
frontend/src/components/mods/ModEnabledT: Toggle component that loads and updates a mod’s enabled state with error handling and retry.
frontend/src/components/mods/ModShareLin: Displays an unlisted mod share URL with copy‑to‑clipboard support and feedback.
frontend/src/components/promo/CreateModS: Promo card component with a button that navigates to the mod creation page.
frontend/src/components/story/StoryModeS: Layout wrapper for story mode sections with title, description, optional actions, and children.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdCountdown.ts: Hook providing a countdown timer with start, pause, reset, and completion callbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioRecorder.ts: Hook for recording audio using MediaRecorder with controls, timing, and blob/url output.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication and status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profiles, story modes, and stubbed mod operations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechSynthesis.ts: Hook wrapping the Web Speech API to speak text and track speaking state.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light/dark modes and feature-specific color themes.
frontend/src/lib/bedrockFiles.ts: Utilities for validating Minecraft Bedrock mod files, extensions, sizes, and count limits.
frontend/src/lib/dialogue.ts: Helpers for adding or removing surrounding quotes from text.
frontend/src/lib/fileLimits.ts: Defines file upload limits and helpers for validating counts and sizes and formatting byte values.
frontend/src/lib/modTypes.ts: Declares interfaces for mod files and mod metadata used as frontend stubs.
frontend/src/lib/storyModeTypes.ts: Defines form types and creators for chapters, quests, and scenes plus conversion to backend format.
frontend/src/lib/unlisted.ts: Generates random unlisted IDs and builds share URLs for mods and characters.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Provides validation helpers for mod titles, descriptions, prompts, versions, and game names.
Defines voice atmosphere presets and a lookup function by ID.
frontend/src/lib/webShare.ts: Implements Web Share API capability checks, URL/file sharing, and clipboard fallback.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/BedrockFileOpenerPage: UI for selecting, validating, sharing, and downloading Bedrock .mcpack/.mcaddon files.
frontend/src/pages/CharacterShowcaseCrea: Provides UI and logic for creating and publishing character showcases with media uploads.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays the user dashboard with navigation to Story Mode and Character Showcase sections.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with hero, navigation buttons, ad placement, and feature cards.
frontend/src/pages/ModCreateWizardPage.t: Four‑step wizard for creating mods with validation and file composition.
frontend/src/pages/ModManagePage.tsx: Mod management page that fetches mod data and shows a disabled backend warning.
frontend/src/pages/PublicCharacterShowca: Public page displaying a shared character’s media, name, and description.
frontend/src/pages/PublicModPage.tsx: Public mod view that attempts to load a mod by unlisted ID but shows a backend-disabled alert.
frontend/src/pages/SignInPage.tsx: Sign‑in page using Internet Identity with automatic redirect and optional profile setup.
frontend/src/pages/StoryModeEditPage.tsx: Editor for creating or updating story modes with chapters, quests, scenes, and media features.
frontend/src/pages/StoryModeHomePage.tsx: Displays a list of story modes with loading, empty, and card views plus actions to create, play, or edit stories. Wrapped in authentication and uses layout and UI components.
frontend/src/pages/StoryModePlayerPage.t: Loads and plays through a story’s chapters and scenes with navigation controls and optional speech synthesis. Handles loading, error, and missing-content states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and related session storage values. Supports both query-string and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, radii, and custom color groups including story/showcase/ad, with animation and typography plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s feature state, including new mod creation UI placement and video ad requirements, along with existing features and metadata.
